cards.title: Player Who Returned 10,000 Years Later
cards.japaneseTitle: 1万年後に帰還したプレイヤー
cards.description: Player Who Returned 10,000 Years Later ManhwaOne day, out of the blue, he falls into hell. All he has with him is his desire to live and predatory powers. From the thousandth hell to the nine thousandth, he‘s devoured tens and hundreds of thousands of demons, and even the seven archdukes bowed down to him. “Why do you wish to go back? Your Highness already has everything in hell.“ “Everything, my ass.“ There’s nothing to eat or enjoy here! Hell’s nothing but desolate land full of terrible demons! “I will return.“ After ten thousand long years, he finally returns to Earth.
cards.japaneseDescription: 一万年後に帰還したプレイヤー マンファある日、突然、地獄に落ちてしまう。 彼に残されたものは、生きる希望と捕食能力だけ。 千番目の地獄から九千番目の地獄まで、何十万もの悪魔を喰らい、七大公ですら彼にひれ伏した。 「なぜ戻るのですか？ 陛下は地獄のすべてをすでに手に入れておられます」「全部だ、くそっ」「ここには食べ物も楽しみもない！ 地獄は恐ろしい悪魔が跋扈する荒涼とした地だ！」 「必ず戻る」 一万年の歳月を経て、ついに彼は地上へと帰還する。

cards.title: Tezuka Osamu:Running with God
cards.description: It tries to pierce through and clarify various legends or myths around Tezuka: what’s really true, what might be exaggerated or misunderstood due to his fame.The book shows how Tezuka, often called the “God of Manga,” had people working closely with him who saw his process, his daily habits, the struggles and efforts behind the legend
cards.japaneseDescription: この本は、手塚治虫にまつわる様々な伝説や神話を突き止め、明らかにしようと試みている。何が真実で、何が彼の名声のために誇張されたり誤解されたりしているのか。本書は、「マンガの神様」と呼ばれる手塚が、彼の制作過程、日々の習慣、伝説の背後にある苦労や努力を見てきた、彼と親しく仕事をしていた人々をどのように描いているかを示している。

cards.title: Pounding
cards.description: When Soyoon meets someone who seems like a savior, his life begins to change — but being connected to that person also becomes risky, because that person is also his worst enemy. So there’s this struggle between rescue and threat.
cards.japaneseDescription: ソユンは救世主のように思える人物と出会い、人生が変わり始める。しかし、その人物と関わることは同時に危険を伴う。なぜなら、その人物は彼にとって最悪の敵でもあるからだ。救いと脅威の間で葛藤するのだ。

cards.title: Death's Love Ballad
cards.description: In this limbo, Lana starts to explore the mysteries of life and death from her new perspective. She deals with supernatural elements (like reapers / death-figures), magic, and possibly the emotional consequences of knowing the one who ended her life is now involved in her after-life state.
cards.japaneseDescription: この宙ぶらりんの状態の中で、ラナは新たな視点から生と死の謎を探求し始める。彼女は超自然的な要素（死神や死神像など）、魔法、そしておそらくは自分の命を奪った者が今、死後の世界に関わっていることを知ることによる感情的な影響などを扱う。

cards.title: Absolute Regression
cards.description: The main character was formerly Gu Feiyang, one of the Ten Martial Emperors. He dies in the Tiandang Mountains.Fifteen years after his death, he is reborn (or reincarnated) as Li Yunxiao in the State of Tianshui. In this new life, he is initially weak / has no opening of his meridians (i.e. considered talentless) by others.With his memories and past power, his goal becomes reclaiming supreme strength and power in a world crowded with geniuses and powerful cultivators.
cards.japaneseDescription: 主人公はかつて十武帝の一人、顧飛阳だった。天当山で亡くなり、死後15年後、天水国で李雲霄として生まれ変わる。この新たな人生において、彼は当初は虚弱で、経絡が開通していない（つまり才能がない）と他人から見なされていた。記憶と過去の力を頼りに、天才や強大な修行者で溢れる世界で、最強の力を取り戻すことを目標とする。

cards.title: The Cold-Blooded Warrior
cards.description: The protagonist is Han Jaewoo, once a hardcore / high-ranked player in the popular game “Savior Of Humanity.” But after a crushing defeat to the Demon Lord, he ends up broke, deep in debt, and disillusioned,But there’s a catch: in order to try for that ending, Han Jaewoo is thrown back into the game world with his stats reset to very low. He starts from almost nothing
cards.japaneseDescription: 主人公はハン・ジェウ。かつては人気ゲーム「人類の救世主」のハードコア／高ランクプレイヤーだった。しかし、魔王に惨敗した後、彼は破産し、多額の借金を抱え、幻滅してしまう。しかし、そこには落とし穴があった。そのエンディングを目指すために、ハン・ジェウはステータスを非常に低い状態にリセットされた状態でゲームの世界に戻されるのだ。彼はほぼゼロの状態からスタートする。

cards.japaneseTitle: 1万年後に帰還したプレイヤー

cards.title: Reincarnation of the Fist King
cards.description: The main character is Dan Woosung, a martial artist who relied purely on his fists in the “murim” (a martial-arts / cultivation society). He is killed by a demon faction,After dying, he reincarnates into a new body: that of the eldest son of a wealthy merchant family named Eunha.Although his new life comes with wealth and some comfort, Dan Woosung retains his past life’s strength, skills, and martial know-how. He’s set on repaying debts and settling old grudges rather than seeking comfort.
cards.japaneseDescription: 主人公はダン・ウソン。武林（武術・修行集団）で拳のみを頼りに生きてきた武術家。魔族に殺され、死後、裕福な商人の長男であるウナの体に生まれ変わる。富と安楽な生活を手に入れたダン・ウソンだが、前世の強さ、技、そして武術のノウハウはそのままに、安楽を求めるよりも借金の返済と過去の恨みを晴らすことに全力を注いでいる。

cards.title: 100-Day Romance
cards.description: In her final moments after being hit by a car, Yoon Jaeyi regrets never having been in a relationship. Fortunately for her, the god of the afterlife is really into returnee stories and has decided to turn back time for her! Jaeyi now has 100 days in which to find a boyfriend if she wants to keep living. Maybe this will be the nudge she needs to confess to that cute regular at her cafe! Or, when her childhood friend returns from overseas, she might finally get the romance she’s always dreamed of.
cards.japaneseDescription: 車に轢かれて最期を迎えるユン・ジェイは、恋愛をしなかったことを後悔していた。しかし、幸運なことに、あの世の神様は帰還者の物語に夢中で、彼女のために時間を戻してくれることに！ジェイは生き続けたいなら、100日以内に彼氏を見つけなければならない。もしかしたら、これがきっかけでカフェの可愛い常連客に告白できるかもしれない！あるいは、幼なじみが海外から帰ってきたら、ずっと夢見ていた恋がついに実現するかもしれない。

cards.title: Son-in-Law Does Cheap Cultivation – Manhuaus
cards.japaneseTitle: 婿養子が格安栽培 – マンファウス
cards.description: After being forced to undergo “dual cultivation” with an empress for a hundred years, Jiang Han splits his soul to escape his torment. Reborn in a new body as a despised son-in-law, he decides to cultivate again — this time on his own terms. Armed with vast knowledge from his past life, Jiang Han rises from humiliation to power, determined to prove his worth in a world of martial strength and spiritual cultivation
cards.japaneseDescription: 100年にも及ぶ皇后との「二元修行」を強いられた江漢は、その苦しみから逃れるため魂を分離する。軽蔑されていた婿として新たな肉体に生まれ変わり、今度は自らの意志で再び修行を始めることを決意する。前世で培った膨大な知識を武器に、江漢は屈辱から権力へと上り詰め、武と修行の世界で自らの価値を証明しようと決意する。

cards.title: Me, The Heavenly Destined Villain
cards.japaneseTitle: 天に召された悪役の私
cards.description: Gu Zhangge was transmigrated into Xuanhuan World. The moment he was transmigrated, he saw many models surrounding the Lucky Male Protagonist and he really show hate him. Even the Female Protagonist was hugging him which lead to many jealousy among the VIP guest who witness it. Since I am more powerful and higher in status than him, destroying him would be very easy, but wait, there is a system here which allow me to receive some of his luck. Gu Zhangge smile to himself, it looks like I will be derailling from the path of the Heavenly Destined Villain more and more!
cards.japaneseDescription: 顧張歌は玄奘界に転生した。転生した途端、幸運の男主人公を取り囲む多くの模型を見て、彼は彼をひどく憎んだ。女主人公でさえ彼に抱きついており、それを目撃したVIP客の間では嫉妬が渦巻いていた。私は彼よりも力も地位も上だから、彼を倒すのは容易いだろう。だが、待てよ、ここには彼の幸運の一部を私にも分け与えるシステムがある。顧張歌は心の中で微笑んだ。ますます天命悪人の道から外れてしまいそうだ！

cards.title: Martial Peak
cards.description: A former top fighter in a notorious underground martial arts world, Liu Zhan (“the Peak Sage”) has long since retired — his body broken, his mind weary, his name only spoken in whispered legends. But when catastrophe strikes his hometown, he is dragged back into the arena.As Liu Zhan returns, he must face rising disciples, ruthless rivals, and a system that devours the weak. With each battle, he seeks not only vengeance but also redemption: reclaiming his former glory, protecting those he cares about, and uncovering just how corrupt the world of martial arts has become.
cards.japaneseDescription: かつて悪名高き地下格闘技界のトップファイターだった劉占（「頂点の賢者」）は、長い間引退していた。肉体は衰え、精神は疲弊し、その名は囁かれる伝説の中でのみ語られていた。しかし、故郷を襲った災厄により、彼は再び闘技場へと引き戻される。戻ってきた劉占は、次々と現れる弟子たち、冷酷なライバルたち、そして弱者を食い尽くす組織に立ち向かう。戦いを重ねるごとに、彼は復讐だけでなく、贖罪も求めていく。かつての栄光を取り戻し、大切な人々を守り、そして格闘技界がいかに腐敗しているかを暴き出すのだ。

cards.title: My Wife is from Thousand Years ago
cards.japaneseTitle: 私の妻は千年前から来た
cards.description: Jiang He, a young girl from the Tang Dynasty who travelled through the millennium. She came to Xu Qing’s eyes and her destiny led her to a love affair that spanned a thousand years. Everything that the young girl was familiar with has become history. Friends, family, deceased friends, enemies, all silenced 1,200 years ago. The young man has no choice but to take the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, laughter and joy will all remain in this new world. There was a time when they were a thousand years apart. Now, they have each other to watch over. In this world, they will be able to find a love that belongs to only two people.
cards.japaneseDescription: 千年の時を旅してきた唐の時代の少女、江河。徐青の目に現れた彼女は、運命に導かれるように千年に及ぶ恋へと導かれる。少女が見慣れていた全てが歴史と化していた。友人、家族、亡き友、敵、全てが1200年前に沈黙を破った。青年は少女を連れて新たな人生を歩み始めるしかなかった。苦しみ、戸惑い、笑い、喜び、全てがこの新たな世界に残る。かつて千年もの間、二人は離れ離れだった。今、二人は互いを見守り合っている。この世界で、二人だけの愛を見つけることができるだろう。

books.title: Jackson's Diary
books.description: The year is 1989, and Jackson is starting his senior year at a brand new school. Even though he's back in his hometown with his new family, he can't seem to shake this ominous and uneasy feeling invading his mind. It's not until he meets the popular kid, Exer, that reality starts to feel more like the work of his imagination.
books.japaneseDescription: 1989年、ジャクソンは新しい学校で高校3年生のスタートを切った。故郷に戻り、新しい家族と暮らしているにもかかわらず、心に忍び寄る不吉で不安な気持ちを拭い去ることができない。人気者のエクサーと出会って初めて、現実が彼の空想の産物のように感じられるようになる。

books.title: The Count’s Youngest Son is A Player
books.japaneseTitle: 伯爵の末っ子は遊び人
books.description: The Count's Youngest Son is A Player, 백작가 막내아들은 플레이어, The youngest son of the count is a player, The youngest of the count is actually a player.
books.japaneseDescription: 伯爵の末っ子は遊び人, 백작가 막내아들은 플레이어, 伯爵の末​​っ子は遊び人, 伯爵の末​​っ子は実は遊び人

books.title: Destined Murderer
books.description: “I can see your number. The number of people you will kill in the future.” If he kills before they kill, the murder will not occur. Serial killer, Number, punishes the ‘Destined Murderers’ one at a time under that resolution. Could his wish to create a world without murder through murder ever be accomplished?
books.japaneseDescription: 「君のナンバーが見える。君がこれから殺す人数だ。」相手が殺す前に自分が殺せば、殺人は起こらない。連続殺人犯ナンバーは、その決意の下、“運命の殺人者”たちを一人ずつ罰していく。殺人を通して殺人のない世界を創るという彼の願いは、果たして叶うのだろうか？

books.title: Kokiji : Records of Ancient Matters
books.description: Kojiki is Japan’s oldest extant chronicle, compiled in 712 AD,It was compiled by Ō no Yasumaro, based on recitations by a person named Hieda no Are, at the behest of the imperial court,It covers myth, legend, genealogy of Japan’s imperial line, and poems/songs. It starts with creation mythology (the “Age of the Gods”), then moves to the legendary emperors, up to historical emperors including Empress Suiko.
books.japaneseDescription: 『古事記』は、712年に編纂された日本最古の年代記です。朝廷の命を受け、稗田阿礼という人物の朗誦に基づいて、大安万侶によって編纂されました。神話、伝説、日本の皇統の系譜、そして詩歌などが収められています。創世神話（「神代」）から始まり、伝説上の天皇、そして推古天皇を含む歴史上の天皇までを網羅しています。

books.title: The Tale of Genji
books.description: Genji is the handsome and gifted son of an emperor and his beloved concubine, Lady Kiritsubo. Because his mother’s low rank makes him politically inconvenient, he is removed from the imperial line and given the surname Minamoto, living as a noble rather than a prince.
books.japaneseDescription: 源氏は、と帝愛妾・桐壺御息所の美貌と才色兼備の息子です。母の身分の低さが政治的に不利であったため、皇統から外され源姓を賜り、王子ではなく貴族として暮らしました。

books.title: Tezuka Osamu:Running with God
books.description: It tries to pierce through and clarify various legends or myths around Tezuka: what’s really true, what might be exaggerated or misunderstood due to his fame.The book shows how Tezuka, often called the “God of Manga,” had people working closely with him who saw his process, his daily habits, the struggles and efforts behind the legend
books.japaneseDescription: この本は、手塚治虫にまつわる様々な伝説や神話を突き止め、明らかにしようと試みている。何が真実で、何が彼の名声のために誇張されたり誤解されたりしているのか。本書は、「マンガの神様」と呼ばれる手塚が、彼の制作過程、日々の習慣、伝説の背後にある苦労や努力を見てきた、彼と親しく仕事をしていた人々をどのように描いているかを示している。

books.title: English of The Rose of Versailles
books.description: The Rose of Versailles is a historical romance manga set in 18th-century France, just before and during the French Revolution. The story follows Oscar François de Jarjayes, a noblewoman who was raised as a man by her father in order to succeed him as commander of the Queen’s guards.
books.japaneseDescription: 『ベルサイユのばら』は、フランス革命直前から革命期にかけての18世紀フランスを舞台にした歴史ロマンス漫画です。物語は、王妃の衛兵隊長として父の後継者となるため、男として育てられた貴族の女性、オスカル・フランソワ・ド・ジャルジェを主人公としています。

books.title: English of The Rose of Versailles
books.description: The Rose of Versailles is a historical romance manga set in 18th-century France, just before and during the French Revolution. The story follows Oscar François de Jarjayes, a noblewoman who was raised as a man by her father in order to succeed him as commander of the Queen’s guards.
books.japaneseDescription: 『ベルサイユのばら』は、フランス革命直前から革命期にかけての18世紀フランスを舞台にした歴史ロマンス漫画です。物語は、王妃の衛兵隊長として父の後継者となるため、男として育てられた貴族の女性、オスカル・フランソワ・ド・ジャルジェを主人公としています。

books.title: Tale of the showa Emperor
books.description: The manga follows the life of Emperor Hirohito (the Showa Emperor), from his youth as a prince to his ascension to the throne and through the turbulent Showa era. It portrays not only big historical events (war, political change, Japan’s modernization, defeat in WWII, and postwar recovery) but also his private, emotional life — the tensions, duties, griefs, doubts, and personal growth.
books.japaneseDescription: この漫画は、昭和天皇の生涯を、皇子時代から即位、そして激動の昭和時代までを描いています。戦争、政変、日本の近代化、第二次世界大戦の敗戦、そして戦後の復興といった大きな歴史的出来事だけでなく、緊張、義務、悲しみ、疑念、そして個人的な成長といった、天皇の私生活や感情的な側面も描いています。

books.title: Pounding
books.description: When Soyoon meets someone who seems like a savior, his life begins to change — but being connected to that person also becomes risky, because that person is also his worst enemy. So there’s this struggle between rescue and threat.
books.japaneseDescription: ソユンは救世主のように思える人物と出会い、人生が変わり始める。しかし、その人物と関わることは同時に危険を伴う。なぜなら、その人物は彼にとって最悪の敵でもあるからだ。救いと脅威の間で葛藤するのだ。

books.title: Death's Love Ballad
books.description: In this limbo, Lana starts to explore the mysteries of life and death from her new perspective. She deals with supernatural elements (like reapers / death-figures), magic, and possibly the emotional consequences of knowing the one who ended her life is now involved in her after-life state.
books.japaneseDescription: この宙ぶらりんの状態の中で、ラナは新たな視点から生と死の謎を探求し始める。彼女は超自然的な要素（死神や死神像など）、魔法、そしておそらくは自分の命を奪った者が今、死後の世界に関わっていることを知ることによる感情的な影響などを扱う。

books.title: Sand Castle
books.description: Eunsung, a college student, accidentally walks in on his crush Jiwoo in an empty lecture hall. This incident becomes a secret that brings them closer.At first, Jiwoo treats the relationship in a self-serving way: he uses Eunsung to satisfy his own desires, rather than genuinely caring for him
books.japaneseDescription: 大学生のウンソンは、誰もいない講義室で、思いを寄せるジウに偶然遭遇する。この出来事がきっかけで、二人はより親密になる。当初、ジウはこの関係を利己的に捉えていた。ウンソンを心から大切に思うのではなく、自分の欲望を満たすために利用していたのだ。

books.title: Evolution From a Tree
books.description: The main character is Yu Ziyu. He unexpectedly wakes up not as a human, but reincarnated as a willow tree in a canyon,Around the same time, spirit energy returns to the world, causing many living beings to mutate. This turns the world into a dangerous place full of threats.
books.japaneseDescription: 主人公の于子豫は、予期せず人間ではなく、峡谷の柳の木に転生した。時を同じくして、精霊の力が再び世界に戻り、多くの生き物が変異し、世界は脅威に満ちた危険な場所へと変貌を遂げる。

books.title: Keep A Low Profile, Sect Leader
books.japaneseTitle: 目立たないように、宗派のリーダー
books.description: The main character (MC) is reborn / transmigrated into a game-like cultivation world called Tian Xuan. He ends up as the leader of a sect which is considered “useless” or weak.His goal is to stay under the radar (i.e. “keep a low profile”) — not to draw too much attention, presumably to avoid danger or rivals. But given his abilities and ambition, that becomes difficult.
books.japaneseDescription: 主人公（MC）は、天軒と呼ばれるゲームのような修行世界に転生・転生します。彼は最終的に、「役立たず」あるいは「弱い」と見なされる宗派の指導者になります。彼の目標は、目立たないように（つまり「目立たないように」）することです。おそらく危険やライバルを避けるため、あまり注目を集めないようにするためでしょう。しかし、彼の能力と野心を考えると、それは困難になります。

books.title: The Eternal Supreme
books.description: The main character was formerly Gu Feiyang, one of the Ten Martial Emperors. He dies in the Tiandang Mountains.Fifteen years after his death, he is reborn (or reincarnated) as Li Yunxiao in the State of Tianshui. In this new life, he is initially weak / has no opening of his meridians (i.e. considered talentless) by others.With his memories and past power, his goal becomes reclaiming supreme strength and power in a world crowded with geniuses and powerful cultivators.
books.japaneseDescription: 主人公はかつて十武帝の一人、顧飛阳だった。天当山で亡くなり、死後15年後、天水国で李雲霄として生まれ変わる。この新たな人生において、彼は当初は虚弱で、経絡が開通していない（つまり才能がない）と他人から見なされていた。記憶と過去の力を頼りに、天才や強大な修行者で溢れる世界で、最強の力を取り戻すことを目標とする。

books.title: Absolute Regression
books.description: The main character was formerly Gu Feiyang, one of the Ten Martial Emperors. He dies in the Tiandang Mountains.Fifteen years after his death, he is reborn (or reincarnated) as Li Yunxiao in the State of Tianshui. In this new life, he is initially weak / has no opening of his meridians (i.e. considered talentless) by others.With his memories and past power, his goal becomes reclaiming supreme strength and power in a world crowded with geniuses and powerful cultivators.
books.japaneseDescription: 主人公はかつて十武帝の一人、顧飛阳だった。天当山で亡くなり、死後15年後、天水国で李雲霄として生まれ変わる。この新たな人生において、彼は当初は虚弱で、経絡が開通していない（つまり才能がない）と他人から見なされていた。記憶と過去の力を頼りに、天才や強大な修行者で溢れる世界で、最強の力を取り戻すことを目標とする。

books.title: The Cold-Blooded Warrior
books.description: The protagonist is Han Jaewoo, once a hardcore / high-ranked player in the popular game “Savior Of Humanity.” But after a crushing defeat to the Demon Lord, he ends up broke, deep in debt, and disillusioned,But there’s a catch: in order to try for that ending, Han Jaewoo is thrown back into the game world with his stats reset to very low. He starts from almost nothing
books.japaneseDescription: 主人公はハン・ジェウ。かつては人気ゲーム「人類の救世主」のハードコア／高ランクプレイヤーだった。しかし、魔王に惨敗した後、彼は破産し、多額の借金を抱え、幻滅してしまう。しかし、そこには落とし穴があった。そのエンディングを目指すために、ハン・ジェウはステータスを非常に低い状態にリセットされた状態でゲームの世界に戻されるのだ。彼はほぼゼロの状態からスタートする。

books.title: The Regressed Son of a Duke is an Assassin
books.japaneseTitle: 退行した公爵の息子は暗殺者
books.description: The main character is Cyan Vert, who is widely considered the best assassin on the continent.He is betrayed and killed by his own brother, a person he trusted deeply.After dying, Cyan Vert is given a second chance at life (a regression/rebirth). With this new chance, he resolves to live differently: to trust no one else but himself, and to pursue his own goals instead of serving others.The story follows his journey as he reclaims strength, power, and status — navigating betrayal, political intrigue, and the challenges of being powerful but isolated.
books.japaneseDescription: 主人公は、大陸最強の暗殺者と広く称されるシアン・ヴェール。彼は深く信頼していた実の兄に裏切られ、命を落とします。死後、シアン・ヴェールは人生の二度目のチャンス（回帰／再生）を与えられ、この新たなチャンスをきっかけに、彼は人生を一変させることを決意します。それは、自分自身以外誰も信じないこと、そして他者に仕えるのではなく、自らの目的を追求すること。物語は、彼が裏切り、政治的陰謀、そして権力を持ちながらも孤立することの困難を乗り越え、強さ、権力、そして地位を取り戻すまでの道のりを描いています。

books.title: The Regressed Son of a Duke is an Assassin
books.japaneseTitle: 退行した公爵の息子は暗殺者
books.description: The main character is Cyan Vert, who is widely considered the best assassin on the continent.He is betrayed and killed by his own brother, a person he trusted deeply.After dying, Cyan Vert is given a second chance at life (a regression/rebirth). books.title: The Regressed Son of a Duke is an Assassin
books.japaneseTitle: 退行した公爵の息子は暗殺者
books.description: Cyan Vert, the best assassin of the continent, meets a pitiful death after having been betrayed by his own brother, whom he had trusted all his life.If I were given another chance at life, I would live it differently. I would only trust myself, and achieve all the things I want on my own without serving anyone else but myself.That is how I was given a second chance at life. The Cyan Vert, a shadow who lived for others, is no more. I will now pave a path on my own, for myself!
books.japaneseDescription: 大陸最強の暗殺者、シアン・ヴェールは、生涯信頼を寄せてきた実の弟に裏切られ、無残な最期を遂げる。もしもう一度人生をやり直せるなら、私は違う生き方をするだろう。自分だけを信じ、誰にも仕えることなく、自分の力で望むものをすべて手に入れる。そうして私は二度目の人生を歩むことができたのだ。他人のために生きてきた影、シアン・ヴェールはもういない。これからは、自分の力で、自分の道を切り拓く！

books.title: The Regressed Son of a Duke is an Assassin
books.japaneseTitle: 退行した公爵の息子は暗殺者
books.description: Cyan Vert, the best assassin of the continent, meets a pitiful death after having been betrayed by his own brother, whom he had trusted all his life.If I were given another chance at life, I would live it differently. I would only trust myself, and achieve all the things I want on my own without serving anyone else but myself.That is how I was given a second chance at life. books.title: Player Who Returned 10,000 Years Later
books.japaneseTitle: 1万年後に帰還したプレイヤー
books.description: Player Who Returned 10,000 Years Later ManhwaOne day, out of the blue, he falls into hell. All he has with him is his desire to live and predatory powers. From the thousandth hell to the nine thousandth, he‘s devoured tens and hundreds of thousands of demons, and even the seven archdukes bowed down to him. “Why do you wish to go back? Your Highness already has everything in hell.“ “Everything, my ass.“ There’s nothing to eat or enjoy here! Hell’s nothing but desolate land full of terrible demons! “I will return.“ After ten thousand long years, he finally returns to Earth.
books.japaneseDescription: 一万年後に帰還したプレイヤー マンファある日、突然、地獄に落ちてしまう。 彼に残されたものは、生きる希望と捕食能力だけ。 千番目の地獄から九千番目の地獄まで、何十万もの悪魔を喰らい、七大公ですら彼にひれ伏した。 「なぜ戻るのですか？ 陛下は地獄のすべてをすでに手に入れておられます」「全部だ、くそっ」「ここには食べ物も楽しみもない！ 地獄は恐ろしい悪魔が跋扈する荒涼とした地だ！」 「必ず戻る」 一万年の歳月を経て、ついに彼は地上へと帰還する。

books.title: The Terminally Ill Young Master of the Baek Clan
books.japaneseTitle: 白一族の末期症状の若旦那
books.description: Baek Yigang (also spelled Baek Yi-Gang) is a young master of the Baek Clan, one of the Seven Great Clans of Zhongyuan. He suffers from a serious condition called the Taiyin Qi Blockage, which leaves him unable to accumulate internal energy (ki/qi) and curses him with a severely shortened lifespan.
books.japaneseDescription: 白易剛（ペク・イーガン）は、中原七大氏族の一つ、白氏の若き当主です。彼は「太陰気塞」と呼ばれる重病を患っており、体内のエネルギー（気）を蓄えることが困難で、そのせいで寿命が著しく短くなっています。

books.title: Reincarnation of the Fist King
books.description: The main character is Dan Woosung, a martial artist who relied purely on his fists in the “murim” (a martial-arts / cultivation society). He is killed by a demon faction,After dying, he reincarnates into a new body: that of the eldest son of a wealthy merchant family named Eunha.Although his new life comes with wealth and some comfort, Dan Woosung retains his past life’s strength, skills, and martial know-how. He’s set on repaying debts and settling old grudges rather than seeking comfort.
books.japaneseDescription: 主人公はダン・ウソン。武林（武術・修行集団）で拳のみを頼りに生きてきた武術家。魔族に殺され、死後、裕福な商人の長男であるウナの体に生まれ変わる。富と安楽な生活を手に入れたダン・ウソンだが、前世の強さ、技、そして武術のノウハウはそのままに、安楽を求めるよりも借金の返済と過去の恨みを晴らすことに全力を注いでいる。

books.title: Chronicles of the Lazy Sovereign
books.description: I couldn’t find solid info on a manga/manhwa titled Chronicles of the Lazy Sovereign. It’s possible it might have a slightly different name, it's very new, or it’s less known so fewer summaries are available.
books.japaneseDescription: 「怠惰の君主クロニクルズ」というタイトルのマンガ/マンファについて、確かな情報を見つけることができませんでした。もしかしたら、タイトルが少し違うか、かなり新しい作品なのか、あまり知られていないため、概要が少ないのかもしれません。

books.title: Chronicles of the Lazy Sovereign
books.description: I couldn’t find solid info on a manga/manhwa titled Chronicles of the Lazy Sovereign. It’s possible it might have a slightly different name, it's very new, or it’s less known so fewer summaries are available.

books.title: The Regressed Son of a Duke is an Assassin
books.japaneseTitle: 退行した公爵の息子は暗殺者
books.description: The protagonist Cyan Vert is famed as the best assassin on the continent. He serves others, works in shadows, trusts people (especially his brother) — until betrayal strikes. He is betrayed by his own brother, someone he considered reliable. This betrayal leads to Cyan’s untimely and unjust death.
books.japaneseDescription: 主人公のシアン・ヴェールは、大陸最高の暗殺者として名を馳せている。彼は他者に仕え、影で暗躍し、人々（特に兄）を信頼していたが、裏切りに見舞われる。頼れる存在だと思っていた実の兄に裏切られ、この裏切りが、シアンの不当かつ早すぎる死へと繋がる。

books.title: The Regressed Son of a Duke is an Assassin
books.japaneseTitle: 退行した公爵の息子は暗殺者
books.description: The protagonist Cyan Vert is famed as the best assassin on the continent. He serves others, works in shadows, trusts people (especially his brother) — until betrayal strikes. He is betrayed by his own brother, someone he considered reliable. This betrayal leads to Cyan’s untimely and unjust death.

books.title: Martial Peak
books.description: The story follows Yang Kai, a low-ranked disciple (even a sweeper) at the Sky / Lingxiao Martial Arts Sect. He’s treated poorly by many because he’s considered weak and talentless.One day Yang Kai acquires a mysterious black book (Wordless Black Book) that changes his luck. This sets him on a path of cultivation, trials, battles, rivalries.
books.japaneseDescription: 物語は、天空・霊霄武術門の低位弟子（しかも掃除屋）であるヤン・カイを主人公とする。彼は弱く才能がないとみなされ、多くの人々から冷遇されてきた。ある日、ヤン・カイは運命を変える謎の黒書（無言の黒書）を手に入れる。これがきっかけで、彼は修行、試練、戦い、そしてライバルとの闘いの道を歩み始める。

This sets him on a path of cultivation, trials, battles, rivalries.

books.title: I Have Twin Girlfriends
books.description: The main character is dating one girl (his girlfriend), but one day she reveals a secret: she has a twin sister — a twin he didn’t know about,This revelation causes confusion, questions of identity (which sister is which?), jealousy, misunderstandings, and a changed dynamic in his relationship(s).The series follows how this secret affects all involved: the protagonist, the girlfriend, and her twin. There are romance and drama, as well as comedic and slice-of-life moments.
books.japaneseDescription: 主人公はガールフレンドと付き合っているが、ある日、彼女が秘密を明かす。彼女には双子の妹がいるのだ。彼はその双子のことを知らなかった。この事実は混乱、アイデンティティの疑問（どちらがどちらか？）、嫉妬、誤解、そして二人の関係性の変化を引き起こす。このシリーズは、この秘密が主人公、ガールフレンド、そして双子の妹、関係者全員にどのような影響を与えるのかを描いている。ロマンスやドラマだけでなく、コメディや日常の出来事も盛り込まれている。

books.title: Magic Emperor
books.description: The magic emperor (Chuo Yifan) was betrayed by the closest people to him because of the legacy of the ancient magical emperor, after his death his soul was transferred to another body and besieged by demons
books.japaneseDescription: 魔法皇帝（チュオ・イーファン）は、古代の魔法皇帝の遺産のために、彼に最も近い人々に裏切られ、彼の死後、彼の魂は別の体に移され、悪魔に包囲されました

books.title: Magic Emperor
books.description: The magic emperor (Chuo Yifan) was betrayed by the closest people to him because of the legacy of the ancient magical emperor, after his death his soul was transferred to another body and besieged by demons
books.japaneseDescription: 魔法皇帝（チュオ・イーファン）は、古代の魔法皇帝の遺産のために、彼に最も近い人々に裏切られ、彼の死後、彼の魂は別の体に移され、悪魔に包囲されました

books.title: I’m An Evil God – Manhuaus
books.description: The magic emperor (Chuo Yifan) was betrayed by the closest people to him because of the legacy of the ancient magical emperor, after his death his soul was transferred to another body and besieged by demons
books.japaneseDescription: 魔法皇帝（チュオ・イーファン）は、古代の魔法皇帝の遺産のために、彼に最も近い人々に裏切られ、彼の死後、彼の魂は別の体に移され、悪魔に包囲されました

books.title: I’m An Evil God – Manhuaus
books.description: The magic emperor (Chuo Yifan) was betrayed by the closest people to him because of the legacy of the ancient magical emperor, after his death his soul was transferred to another body and besieged by demons

books.title: Dragon Ball
books.description: Dragon Ball is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Akira Toriyama. It was originally serialized in Weekly Shōnen Jump magazine from 1984 to 1995, and later collected into 42 tankōbon volumes by Shueisha.The story follows Son Goku, a cheerful and naive boy with a monkey tail, as he embarks on a journey to find the seven Dragon Balls — mystical orbs that, when gathered together, can summon a dragon who grants any wish. Along the way, Goku trains in martial arts, makes lifelong friends, and faces powerful foes.
books.japaneseDescription: 『ドラゴンボール』は、鳥山明による日本の漫画作品です。1984年から1995年にかけて『週刊少年ジャンプ』で連載され、後に集英社から単行本全42巻として刊行されました。物語は、猿の尻尾を持つ明るく純朴な少年、孫悟空が、7つのドラゴンボールを探す旅に出る様子を描いています。ドラゴンボールとは、集めることでどんな願いも叶えてくれる龍を召喚できる不思議な球体です。旅の途中で、悟空は武術を修行し、生涯の友を作り、強大な敵に立ち向かいます。

books.title: Concerto - Mangá Traduzido em PT-BR
books.japaneseTitle: 協奏曲 - PT-BR によるマンガ トラドゥジド
books.description: Duas amigas que tocam belas melodias juntas ultrapassam os limites da amizade e veem seu relacionamento florescer para algo mais. Contudo, o fim do curso se aproxima, trazendo incertezas: será que o destino vai separá-las? Será que este romance vai alcançar um final feliz, ou a despedida marcará o fim de tudo?
books.japaneseDescription: 多くの友人が、メロディアスなジュンタスとウルトラパッサムなOSの制限を制限し、アルゴリズムに合わせてフローレッサーとの関係を確認します。 Contudo, o fim do curso se aproxima, trazendo incertezas: será que o destino vai separá-las?最後のフェリスとのロマンスは、あなたにとって最高のロマンスですか？

books.title: 100-Day Romance
books.description: In her final moments after being hit by a car, Yoon Jaeyi regrets never having been in a relationship. Fortunately for her, the god of the afterlife is really into returnee stories and has decided to turn back time for her! Jaeyi now has 100 days in which to find a boyfriend if she wants to keep living. Maybe this will be the nudge she needs to confess to that cute regular at her cafe! Or, when her childhood friend returns from overseas, she might finally get the romance she’s always dreamed of.
books.japaneseDescription: 車に轢かれて最期を迎えるユン・ジェイは、恋愛をしなかったことを後悔していた。しかし、幸運なことに、あの世の神様は帰還者の物語に夢中で、彼女のために時間を戻してくれることに！ジェイは生き続けたいなら、100日以内に彼氏を見つけなければならない。もしかしたら、これがきっかけでカフェの可愛い常連客に告白できるかもしれない！あるいは、幼なじみが海外から帰ってきたら、ずっと夢見ていた恋がついに実現するかもしれない。

books.title: My Wife is from Thousand Years ago
books.japaneseTitle: 私の妻は千年前から来た
books.description: Jiang He, a young girl from the Tang Dynasty who travelled through the millennium. She came to Xu Qing’s eyes and her destiny led her to a love affair that spanned a thousand years. Everything that the young girl was familiar with has become history. Friends, family, deceased friends, enemies, all silenced 1,200 years ago. The young man has no choice but to take the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, laughter and joy will all remain in this new world. There was a time when they were a thousand years apart. Now, they have each other to watch over. In this world, they will be able to find a love that belongs to only two people.
books.japaneseDescription: 千年の時を旅してきた唐の時代の少女、江河。徐青の目に現れた彼女は、運命に導かれるように千年に及ぶ恋へと導かれる。少女が見慣れていた全てが歴史と化していた。友人、家族、亡き友、敵、全てが1200年前に沈黙を破った。青年は少女を連れて新たな人生を歩み始めるしかなかった。苦しみ、戸惑い、笑い、喜び、全てがこの新たな世界に残る。かつて千年もの間、二人は離れ離れだった。今、二人は互いを見守り合っている。この世界で、二人だけの愛を見つけることができるだろう。

books.title: Starting As The God Of Wealth, Taming Billions Of Divine Pets!
books.japaneseTitle: 富の神としてスタートし、数十億の神々のペットを飼いならす
books.description: The apocalypse game swept across the globe and merged with the real world, causing the collapse of order. In his previous life, Ye Xiao devoted everything to elevating his fiancée, Liu Ruyan, to the pinnacle of power, only to have his heart literally ripped out by her on the day of their engagement and transplanted into her male best friend. Reborn into a new life, Ye Xiao resolves to ascend the throne alone. Before the game closes its recharge portal, he spends billions of his fortune to switch to a god-level profession.
books.japaneseDescription: 終末ゲームは世界中を席巻し、現実世界と融合し、秩序を崩壊させた。前世で、葉暁は婚約者の劉如燕を権力の頂点に押し上げることにすべてを捧げたが、婚約当日、文字通り彼女に心臓を引き裂かれ、彼女の親友の男性に移植されてしまう。新たな人生に生まれ変わった葉暁は、一人で王位に就くことを決意する。ゲームの充電ポータルが閉じられる前に、彼は数十億もの財を投じて神級の職業に転向する。

books.title: Son-in-Law Does Cheap Cultivation – Manhuaus
books.japaneseTitle: 婿養子が格安栽培 – マンファウス
books.description: After being forced to undergo “dual cultivation” with an empress for a hundred years, Jiang Han splits his soul to escape his torment. Reborn in a new body as a despised son-in-law, he decides to cultivate again — this time on his own terms. Armed with vast knowledge from his past life, Jiang Han rises from humiliation to power, determined to prove his worth in a world of martial strength and spiritual cultivation
books.japaneseDescription: 100年にも及ぶ皇后との「二元修行」を強いられた江漢は、その苦しみから逃れるため魂を分離する。軽蔑されていた婿として新たな肉体に生まれ変わり、今度は自らの意志で再び修行を始めることを決意する。前世で培った膨大な知識を武器に、江漢は屈辱から権力へと上り詰め、武と修行の世界で自らの価値を証明しようと決意する。

books.title: Son-in-Law Does Cheap Cultivation – Manhuaus
books.japaneseTitle: 婿養子が格安栽培 – マンファウス

books.title: First Order
books.description: After a great catastrophe stuck, humanity started living in anarchy. Acid rain floated across the sky, wild wolves roared in the wilderness, the consortium in the barrier sang night after night, and the refugees outside the wall were hungry and cold. “Ren Xiaosu”, who was born as a refugee, unlocked the palace system and continued to grow stronger by absorbing positive energy, fighting for survival, protecting relatives and friends, saving sentient beings, and gradually changing the world, becoming the dawn of mankind’s future. this is a brand new story… survive the darkness, see the light.
books.japaneseDescription: 大災害が襲いかかり、人類は無秩序な生活を送り始めた。酸性雨が空を漂い、荒野では野生の狼が咆哮し、結界内の盟友たちは夜な夜な歌を歌い、壁の外の難民たちは飢えと寒さに苦しんでいた。難民として生まれた「任小蘇」は、宮殿のシステムを解き放ち、正のエネルギーを吸収することで力をつけ続け、生存のために戦い、親族や友人を守り、衆生を救い、徐々に世界を変え、人類の未来の夜明けとなった。これは全く新しい物語…闇を生き抜き、光を見出す。

books.title: Me, The Heavenly Destined Villain
books.japaneseTitle: 天に召された悪役の私
books.description: Gu Zhangge was transmigrated into Xuanhuan World. The moment he was transmigrated, he saw many models surrounding the Lucky Male Protagonist and he really show hate him. Even the Female Protagonist was hugging him which lead to many jealousy among the VIP guest who witness it. Since I am more powerful and higher in status than him, destroying him would be very easy, but wait, there is a system here which allow me to receive some of his luck. Gu Zhangge smile to himself, it looks like I will be derailling from the path of the Heavenly Destined Villain more and more!
books.japaneseDescription: 顧張歌は玄奘界に転生した。転生した途端、幸運の男主人公を取り囲む多くの模型を見て、彼は彼をひどく憎んだ。女主人公でさえ彼に抱きついており、それを目撃したVIP客の間では嫉妬が渦巻いていた。私は彼よりも力も地位も上だから、彼を倒すのは容易いだろう。だが、待てよ、ここには彼の幸運の一部を私にも分け与えるシステムがある。顧張歌は心の中で微笑んだ。ますます天命悪人の道から外れてしまいそうだ！

books.title: Age of Terror
books.description: After a weird hundred years where ghost were appearing, only one-tenth of mankind remained and the number of ghosts exceeding the number of humans remaining! In order to survive, humans needed to choose a “companion ghost” from birth, and constantly cultivate their own companion ghost so that they can be used to fight against other ghosts. The world has entered a weird era of co-existence with ghosts! With the help of the system, the invincible ghost cultivated by Lin Feng causes the whole world to tremble.
books.japaneseDescription: 鬼が出現した奇妙な百年が過ぎ、人類はわずか10分の1しか残っておらず、鬼の数は人類の数を上回っていた！ 生き残るためには、人間は生まれた時から「伴鬼」を選び、常に自身の伴鬼を育成し、他の鬼と戦わせる必要があった。世界は鬼と共存する奇妙な時代へと突入した！ システムの力を借り、リン・フェンが育成した無敵の鬼は、全世界を震撼させた。

books.title: Martial Peak
books.description: A former top fighter in a notorious underground martial arta world, Liu Zhan (“the Peak Sage”) has long since retired — his body broken, his mind weary, his name only spoken in whispered legends. But when catastrophe strikes his hometown, he is dragged back into the arena.As Liu Zhan returns, he must face rising disciples, ruthless rivals, and a system that devours the weak. With each battle, he seeks not only vengeance but also redemption: reclaiming his former glory, protecting those he cares about, and uncovering just how corrupt the world of martial arts has become.
books.japaneseDescription: かつて悪名高き地下格闘技界のトップファイターだった劉占（「頂点の賢者」）は、長い間引退していた。肉体は衰え、精神は疲弊し、その名は囁かれる伝説の中でのみ語られていた。しかし、故郷を襲った災厄により、彼は再び闘技場へと引き戻される。戻ってきた劉占は、次々と現れる弟子たち、冷酷なライバルたち、そして弱者を食い尽くす組織に立ち向かう。戦いを重ねるごとに、彼は復讐だけでなく、贖罪も求めていく。かつての栄光を取り戻し、大切な人々を守り、そして格闘技界がいかに腐敗しているかを暴き出すのだ。

sunday.title: Tale of the showa Emperor
sunday.description: The manga follows the life of Emperor Hirohito (the Showa Emperor), from his youth as a prince to his ascension to the throne and through the turbulent Showa era. It portrays not only big historical events (war, political change, Japan’s modernization, defeat in WWII, and postwar recovery) but also his private, emotional life — the tensions, duties, griefs, doubts, and personal growth.
sunday.japaneseDescription: この漫画は、昭和天皇の生涯を、皇子時代から即位、そして激動の昭和時代までを描いています。戦争、政変、日本の近代化、第二次世界大戦の敗戦、そして戦後の復興といった大きな歴史的出来事だけでなく、緊張、義務、悲しみ、疑念、そして個人的な成長といった、天皇の私生活や感情的な側面も描いています。

sunday.title: Kokiji : Records of Ancient Matters
sunday.description: Kojiki is Japan’s oldest extant chronicle, compiled in 712 AD,It was compiled by Ō no Yasumaro, based on recitations by a person named Hieda no Are, at the behest of the imperial court,It covers myth, legend, genealogy of Japan’s imperial line, and poems/songs. It starts with creation mythology (the “Age of the Gods”), then moves to the legendary emperors, up to historical emperors including Empress Suiko.
sunday.japaneseDescription: 『古事記』は、712年に編纂された日本最古の年代記です。朝廷の命を受け、稗田阿礼という人物の朗誦に基づいて、大安万侶によって編纂されました。神話、伝説、日本の皇統の系譜、そして詩歌などが収められています。創世神話（「神代」）から始まり、伝説上の天皇、そして推古天皇を含む歴史上の天皇までを網羅しています。

sunday.title: The Regressed Son of a Duke is an Assassin
sunday.japaneseTitle: 退行した公爵の息子は暗殺者
sunday.description: Cyan Vert, the best assassin of the continent, meets a pitiful death after having been betrayed by his own brother, whom he had trusted all his life.If I were given another chance at life, I would live it differently. I would only trust myself, and achieve all the things I want on my own without serving anyone else but myself.That is how I was given a second chance at life. The Cyan Vert, a shadow who lived for others, is no more. I will now pave a path on my own, for myself!
sunday.japaneseDescription: 大陸最強の暗殺者、シアン・ヴェールは、生涯信頼を寄せてきた実の弟に裏切られ、無残な最期を遂げる。もしもう一度人生をやり直せるなら、私は違う生き方をするだろう。自分だけを信じ、誰にも仕えることなく、自分の力で望むものをすべて手に入れる。そうして私は二度目の人生を歩むことができたのだ。他人のために生きてきた影、シアン・ヴェールはもういない。これからは、自分の力で、自分の道を切り拓く！

sunday.title: The Count’s Youngest Son is A Player
sunday.japaneseTitle: 伯爵の末っ子は遊び人
sunday.description: The Count's Youngest Son is A Player, 백작가 막내아들은 플레이어, The youngest son of the count is a player, The youngest of the count is actually a player.
sunday.japaneseDescription: 伯爵の末っ子は遊び人, 백작가 막내아들은 플레이어, 伯爵の末​​っ子は遊び人, 伯爵の末​​っ子は実は遊び人

sunday.title: Age of Terror
sunday.description: After a weird hundred years where ghost were appearing, only one-tenth of mankind remained and the number of ghosts exceeding the number of humans remaining! In order to survive, humans needed to choose a “companion ghost” from birth, and constantly cultivate their own companion ghost so that they can be used to fight against other ghosts. The world has entered a weird era of co-existence with ghosts! With the help of the system, the invincible ghost cultivated by Lin Feng causes the whole world to tremble.
sunday.japaneseDescription: 鬼が出現した奇妙な百年が過ぎ、人類はわずか10分の1しか残っておらず、鬼の数は人類の数を上回っていた！ 生き残るためには、人間は生まれた時から「伴鬼」を選び、常に自身の伴鬼を育成し、他の鬼と戦わせる必要があった。世界は鬼と共存する奇妙な時代へと突入した！ システムの力を借り、リン・フェンが育成した無敵の鬼は、全世界を震撼させた。

sunday.title: Starting As The God Of Wealth, Taming Billions Of Divine Pets!
sunday.japaneseTitle: 富の神としてスタートし、数十億の神々のペットを飼いならす
sunday.description: The apocalypse game swept across the globe and merged with the real world, causing the collapse of order. In his previous life, Ye Xiao devoted everything to elevating his fiancée, Liu Ruyan, to the pinnacle of power, only to have his heart literally ripped out by her on the day of their engagement and transplanted into her male best friend. Reborn into a new life, Ye Xiao resolves to ascend the throne alone. Before the game closes its recharge portal, he spends billions of his fortune to switch to a god-level profession.
sunday.japaneseDescription: 終末ゲームは世界中を席巻し、現実世界と融合し、秩序を崩壊させた。前世で、葉暁は婚約者の劉如燕を権力の頂点に押し上げることにすべてを捧げたが、婚約当日、文字通り彼女に心臓を引き裂かれ、彼女の親友の男性に移植されてしまう。新たな人生に生まれ変わった葉暁は、一人で王位に就くことを決意する。ゲームの充電ポータルが閉じられる前に、彼は数十億もの財を投じて神級の職業に転向する。

sunday.title: Martial Peak
sunday.description: A former top fighter in a notorious underground martial arts world, Liu Zhan (“the Peak Sage”) has long since retired — his body broken, his mind weary, his name only spoken in whispered legends. But when catastrophe strikes his hometown, he is dragged back into the arena.As Liu Zhan returns, he must face rising disciples, ruthless rivals, and a system that devours the weak. With each battle, he seeks not only vengeance but also redemption: reclaiming his former glory, protecting those he cares about, and uncovering just how corrupt the world of martial arts has become.
sunday.japaneseDescription: かつて悪名高き地下格闘技界のトップファイターだった劉占（「頂点の賢者」）は、長い間引退していた。肉体は衰え、精神は疲弊し、その名は囁かれる伝説の中でのみ語られていた。しかし、故郷を襲った災厄により、彼は再び闘技場へと引き戻される。戻ってきた劉占は、次々と現れる弟子たち、冷酷なライバルたち、そして弱者を食い尽くす組織に立ち向かう。戦いを重ねるごとに、彼は復讐だけでなく、贖罪も求めていく。かつての栄光を取り戻し、大切な人々を守り、そして格闘技界がいかに腐敗しているかを暴き出すのだ。

monday.title: Destined Murderer
monday.description: “I can see your number. The number of people you will kill in the future.” If he kills before they kill, the murder will not occur. Serial killer, Number, punishes the ‘Destined Murderers’ one at a time under that resolution. Could his wish to create a world without murder through murder ever be accomplished?
monday.japaneseDescription: 「君のナンバーが見える。君がこれから殺す人数だ。」相手が殺す前に自分が殺せば、殺人は起こらない。連続殺人犯ナンバーは、その決意の下、“運命の殺人者”たちを一人ずつ罰していく。殺人を通して殺人のない世界を創るという彼の願いは、果たして叶うのだろうか？

monday.title: The Cold-Blooded Warrior
monday.description: The protagonist is Han Jaewoo, once a hardcore / high-ranked player in the popular game “Savior Of Humanity.” But after a crushing defeat to the Demon Lord, he ends up broke, deep in debt, and disillusioned,But there’s a catch: in order to try for that ending, Han Jaewoo is thrown back into the game world with his stats reset to very low. He starts from almost nothing
monday.japaneseDescription: 主人公はハン・ジェウ。かつては人気ゲーム「人類の救世主」のハードコア／高ランクプレイヤーだった。しかし、魔王に惨敗した後、彼は破産し、多額の借金を抱え、幻滅してしまう。しかし、そこには落とし穴があった。そのエンディングを目指すために、ハン・ジェウはステータスを非常に低い状態にリセットされた状態でゲームの世界に戻されるのだ。彼はほぼゼロの状態からスタートする。

monday.title: I Have Twin Girlfriends
monday.description: The main character is dating one girl (his girlfriend), but one day she reveals a secret: she has a twin sister — a twin he didn’t know about,This revelation causes confusion, questions of identity (which sister is which?), jealousy, misunderstandings, and a changed dynamic in his relationship(s).The series follows how this secret affects all involved: the protagonist, the girlfriend, and her twin. There are romance and drama, as well as comedic and slice-of-life moments.
monday.japaneseDescription: 主人公はガールフレンドと付き合っているが、ある日、彼女が秘密を明かす。彼女には双子の妹がいるのだ。彼はその双子のことを知らなかった。この事実は混乱、アイデンティティの疑問（どちらがどちらか？）、嫉妬、誤解、そして二人の関係性の変化を引き起こす。このシリーズは、この秘密が主人公、ガールフレンド、そして双子の妹、関係者全員にどのような影響を与えるのかを描いている。ロマンスやドラマだけでなく、コメディや日常の出来事も盛り込まれている。

monday.title: Me, The Heavenly Destined Villain
monday.japaneseTitle: 天に召された悪役の私
monday.description: Gu Zhangge was transmigrated into Xuanhuan World. The moment he was transmigrated, he saw many models surrounding the Lucky Male Protagonist and he really show hate him. Even the Female Protagonist was hugging him which lead to many jealousy among the VIP guest who witness it. Since I am more powerful and higher in status than him, destroying him would be very easy, but wait, there is a system here which allow me to receive some of his luck. Gu Zhangge smile to himself, it looks like I will be derailling from the path of the Heavenly Destined Villain more and more!
monday.japaneseDescription: 顧張歌は玄奘界に転生した。転生した途端、幸運の男主人公を取り囲む多くの模型を見て、彼は彼をひどく憎んだ。女主人公でさえ彼に抱きついており、それを目撃したVIP客の間では嫉妬が渦巻いていた。私は彼よりも力も地位も上だから、彼を倒すのは容易いだろう。だが、待てよ、ここには彼の幸運の一部を私にも分け与えるシステムがある。顧張歌は心の中で微笑んだ。ますます天命悪人の道から外れてしまいそうだ！

monday.title: Kokiji : Records of Ancient Matters
monday.description: Kojiki is Japan’s oldest extant chronicle, compiled in 712 AD,It was compiled by Ō no Yasumaro, based on recitations by a person named Hieda no Are, at the behest of the imperial court,It covers myth, legend, genealogy of Japan’s imperial line, and poems/songs. It starts with creation mythology (the “Age of the Gods”), then moves to the legendary emperors, up to historical emperors including Empress Suiko.
monday.japaneseDescription: 『古事記』は、712年に編纂された日本最古の年代記です。朝廷の命を受け、稗田阿礼という人物の朗誦に基づいて、大安万侶によって編纂されました。神話、伝説、日本の皇統の系譜、そして詩歌などが収められています。創世神話（「神代」）から始まり、伝説上の天皇、そして推古天皇を含む歴史上の天皇までを網羅しています。

monday.title: The Regressed Son of a Duke is an Assassin
monday.japaneseTitle: 退行した公爵の息子は暗殺者
monday.description: The main character is Cyan Vert, who is widely considered the best assassin on the continent.He is betrayed and killed by his own brother, a person he trusted deeply.After dying, Cyan Vert is given a second chance at life (a regression/rebirth). With this new chance, he resolves to live differently: to trust no one else but himself, and to pursue his own goals instead of serving others.The story follows his journey as he reclaims strength, power, and status — navigating betrayal, political intrigue, and the challenges of being powerful but isolated.
monday.japaneseDescription: 主人公は、大陸最強の暗殺者と広く称されるシアン・ヴェール。彼は深く信頼していた実の兄に裏切られ、命を落とします。死後、シアン・ヴェールは人生の二度目のチャンス（回帰／再生）を与えられ、この新たなチャンスをきっかけに、彼は人生を一変させることを決意します。それは、自分自身以外誰も信じないこと、そして他者に仕えるのではなく、自らの目的を追求すること。物語は、彼が裏切り、政治的陰謀、そして権力を持ちながらも孤立することの困難を乗り越え、強さ、権力、そして地位を取り戻すまでの道のりを描いています。

monday.title: Martial Peak
monday.description: The story follows Yang Kai, a low-ranked disciple (even a sweeper) at the Sky / Lingxiao Martial Arts Sect. He’s treated poorly by many because he’s considered weak and talentless.One day Yang Kai acquires a mysterious black book (Wordless Black Book) that changes his luck. This sets him on a path of cultivation, trials, battles, rivalries.
monday.japaneseDescription: 物語は、天空・霊霄武術門の低位弟子（しかも掃除屋）であるヤン・カイを主人公とする。彼は弱く才能がないとみなされ、多くの人々から冷遇されてきた。ある日、ヤン・カイは運命を変える謎の黒書（無言の黒書）を手に入れる。これがきっかけで、彼は修行、試練、戦い、そしてライバルとの闘いの道を歩み始める。

tuesday.title: The Regressed Son of a Duke is an Assassin
tuesday.japaneseTitle: 退行した公爵の息子は暗殺者
tuesday.description: Cyan Vert, the best assassin of the continent, meets a pitiful death after having been betrayed by his own brother, whom he had trusted all his life.If I were given another chance at life, I would live it differently. I would only trust myself, and achieve all the things I want on my own without serving anyone else but myself.That is how I was given a second chance at life. The Cyan Vert, a shadow who lived for others, is no more. I will now pave a path on my own, for myself!
tuesday.japaneseDescription: 大陸最強の暗殺者、シアン・ヴェールは、生涯信頼を寄せてきた実の弟に裏切られ、無残な最期を遂げる。もしもう一度人生をやり直せるなら、私は違う生き方をするだろう。自分だけを信じ、誰にも仕えることなく、自分の力で望むものをすべて手に入れる。そうして私は二度目の人生を歩むことができたのだ。他人のために生きてきた影、シアン・ヴェールはもういない。これからは、自分の力で、自分の道を切り拓く！

tuesday.title: Player Who Returned 10,000 Years Later
tuesday.japaneseTitle: 1万年後に帰還したプレイヤー
tuesday.description: Player Who Returned 10,000 Years Later ManhwaOne day, out of the blue, he falls into hell. All he has with him is his desire to live and predatory powers. From the thousandth hell to the nine thousandth, he‘s devoured tens and hundreds of thousands of demons, and even the seven archdukes bowed down to him. “Why do you wish to go back? Your Highness already has everything in hell.“ “Everything, my ass.“ There’s nothing to eat or enjoy here! Hell’s nothing but desolate land full of terrible demons! “I will return.“ After ten thousand long years, he finally returns to Earth.
tuesday.japaneseDescription: 一万年後に帰還したプレイヤー マンファある日、突然、地獄に落ちてしまう。 彼に残されたものは、生きる希望と捕食能力だけ。 千番目の地獄から九千番目の地獄まで、何十万もの悪魔を喰らい、七大公ですら彼にひれ伏した。 「なぜ戻るのですか？ 陛下は地獄のすべてをすでに手に入れておられます」「全部だ、くそっ」「ここには食べ物も楽しみもない！ 地獄は恐ろしい悪魔が跋扈する荒涼とした地だ！」 「必ず戻る」 一万年の歳月を経て、ついに彼は地上へと帰還する。

tuesday.title: The Terminally Ill Young Master of the Baek Clan
tuesday.japaneseTitle: 白一族の末期症状の若旦那
tuesday.description: Baek Yigang (also spelled Baek Yi-Gang) is a young master of the Baek Clan, one of the Seven Great Clans of Zhongyuan. He suffers from a serious condition called the Taiyin Qi Blockage, which leaves him unable to accumulate internal energy (ki/qi) and curses him with a severely shortened lifespan.
tuesday.japaneseDescription: 白易剛（ペク・イーガン）は、中原七大氏族の一つ、白氏の若き当主です。彼は「太陰気塞」と呼ばれる重病を患っており、体内のエネルギー（気）を蓄えることが困難で、そのせいで寿命が著しく短くなっています。

tuesday.title: Reincarnation of the Fist King
tuesday.description: The main character is Dan Woosung, a martial artist who relied purely on his fists in the “murim” (a martial-arts / cultivation society). He is killed by a demon faction,After dying, he reincarnates into a new body: that of the eldest son of a wealthy merchant family named Eunha.Although his new life comes with wealth and some comfort, Dan Woosung retains his past life’s strength, skills, and martial know-how. He’s set on repaying debts and settling old grudges rather than seeking comfort.
tuesday.japaneseDescription: 主人公はダン・ウソン。武林（武術・修行集団）で拳のみを頼りに生きてきた武術家。魔族に殺され、死後、裕福な商人の長男であるウナの体に生まれ変わる。富と安楽な生活を手に入れたダン・ウソンだが、前世の強さ、技、そして武術のノウハウはそのままに、安楽を求めるよりも借金の返済と過去の恨みを晴らすことに全力を注いでいる。

tuesday.title: Chronicles of the Lazy Sovereign
tuesday.description: I couldn’t find solid info on a manga/manhwa titled Chronicles of the Lazy Sovereign. It’s possible it might have a slightly different name, it's very new, or it’s less known so fewer summaries are available.
tuesday.japaneseDescription: 「怠惰の君主クロニクルズ」というタイトルのマンガ/マンファについて、確かな情報を見つけることができませんでした。もしかしたら、タイトルが少し違うか、かなり新しい作品なのか、あまり知られていないため、概要が少ないのかもしれません。

wednesday.title: 100-Day Romance
wednesday.description: In her final moments after being hit by a car, Yoon Jaeyi regrets never having been in a relationship. Fortunately for her, the god of the afterlife is really into returnee stories and has decided to turn back time for her! Jaeyi now has 100 days in which to find a boyfriend if she wants to keep living. Maybe this will be the nudge she needs to confess to that cute regular at her cafe! Or, when her childhood friend returns from overseas, she might finally get the romance she’s always dreamed of.
wednesday.japaneseDescription: 車に轢かれて最期を迎えるユン・ジェイは、恋愛をしなかったことを後悔していた。しかし、幸運なことに、あの世の神様は帰還者の物語に夢中で、彼女のために時間を戻してくれることに！ジェイは生き続けたいなら、100日以内に彼氏を見つけなければならない。もしかしたら、これがきっかけでカフェの可愛い常連客に告白できるかもしれない！あるいは、幼なじみが海外から帰ってきたら、ずっと夢見ていた恋がついに実現するかもしれない。

Or, when her childhood friend returns from overseas, she might finally get the romance she’s always dreamed of.
wednesday.japaneseDescription: 車に轢かれて最期を迎えるユン・ジェイは、恋愛をしなかったことを後悔していた。しかし、幸運なことに、あの世の神様は帰還者の物語に夢中で、彼女のために時間を戻してくれることに！ジェイは生き続けたいなら、100日以内に彼氏を見つけなければならない。もしかしたら、これがきっかけでカフェの可愛い常連客に告白できるかもしれない！あるいは、幼なじみが海外から帰ってきたら、ずっと夢見ていた恋がついに実現するかもしれない。

wednesday.title: My Wife is from Thousand Years ago
wednesday.japaneseTitle: 私の妻は千年前から来た
wednesday.description: Jiang He, a young girl from the Tang Dynasty who travelled through the millennium. She came to Xu Qing’s eyes and her destiny led her to a love affair that spanned a thousand years. Everything that the young girl was familiar with has become history. Friends, family, deceased friends, enemies, all silenced 1,200 years ago. The young man has no choice but to take the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, laughter and joy will all remain in this new world. There was a time when they were a thousand years apart. Now, they have each other to watch over. In this world, they will be able to find a love that belongs to only two people.
wednesday.japaneseDescription: 千年の時を旅してきた唐の時代の少女、江河。徐青の目に現れた彼女は、運命に導かれるように千年に及ぶ恋へと導かれる。少女が見慣れていた全てが歴史と化していた。友人、家族、亡き友、敵、全てが1200年前に沈黙を破った。青年は少女を連れて新たな人生を歩み始めるしかなかった。苦しみ、戸惑い、笑い、喜び、全てがこの新たな世界に残る。かつて千年もの間、二人は離れ離れだった。今、二人は互いを見守り合っている。この世界で、二人だけの愛を見つけることができるだろう。

wednesday.title: Starting As The God Of Wealth, Taming Billions Of Divine Pets!
wednesday.japaneseTitle: 富の神としてスタートし、数十億の神々のペットを飼いならす
wednesday.description: The apocalypse game swept across the globe and merged with the real world, causing the collapse of order. In his previous life, Ye Xiao devoted everything to elevating his fiancée, Liu Ruyan, to the pinnacle of power, only to have his heart literally ripped out by her on the day of their engagement and transplanted into her male best friend. Reborn into a new life, Ye Xiao resolves to ascend the throne alone. Before the game closes its recharge portal, he spends billions of his fortune to switch to a god-level profession.
wednesday.japaneseDescription: 終末ゲームは世界中を席巻し、現実世界と融合し、秩序を崩壊させた。前世で、葉暁は婚約者の劉如燕を権力の頂点に押し上げることにすべてを捧げたが、婚約当日、文字通り彼女に心臓を引き裂かれ、彼女の親友の男性に移植されてしまう。新たな人生に生まれ変わった葉暁は、一人で王位に就くことを決意する。ゲームの充電ポータルが閉じられる前に、彼は数十億もの財を投じて神級の職業に転向する。

thursday.title: Me, The Heavenly Destined Villain
thursday.japaneseTitle: 天に召された悪役の私
thursday.description: Gu Zhangge was transmigrated into Xuanhuan World. The moment he was transmigrated, he saw many models surrounding the Lucky Male Protagonist and he really show hate him. Even the Female Protagonist was hugging him which lead to many jealousy among the VIP guest who witness it. Since I am more powerful and higher in status than him, destroying him would be very easy, but wait, there is a system here which allow me to receive some of his luck. Gu Zhangge smile to himself, it looks like I will be derailling from the path of the Heavenly Destined Villain more and more!
thursday.japaneseDescription: 顧張歌は玄奘界に転生した。転生した途端、幸運の男主人公を取り囲む多くの模型を見て、彼は彼をひどく憎んだ。女主人公でさえ彼に抱きついており、それを目撃したVIP客の間では嫉妬が渦巻いていた。私は彼よりも力も地位も上だから、彼を倒すのは容易いだろう。だが、待てよ、ここには彼の幸運の一部を私にも分け与えるシステムがある。顧張歌は心の中で微笑んだ。ますます天命悪人の道から外れてしまいそうだ！

thursday.title: Age of Terror
thursday.description: After a weird hundred years where ghost were appearing, only one-tenth of mankind remained and the number of ghosts exceeding the number of humans remaining! In order to survive, humans needed to choose a “companion ghost” from birth, and constantly cultivate their own companion ghost so that they can be used to fight against other ghosts. The world has entered a weird era of co-existence with ghosts! With the help of the system, the invincible ghost cultivated by Lin Feng causes the whole world to tremble.
thursday.japaneseDescription: 鬼が出現した奇妙な百年が過ぎ、人類はわずか10分の1しか残っておらず、鬼の数は人類の数を上回っていた！ 生き残るためには、人間は生まれた時から「伴鬼」を選び、常に自身の伴鬼を育成し、他の鬼と戦わせる必要があった。世界は鬼と共存する奇妙な時代へと突入した！ システムの力を借り、リン・フェンが育成した無敵の鬼は、全世界を震撼させた。

thursday.title: Martial Peak
thursday.description: A former top fighter in a notorious underground martial arta world, Liu Zhan (“the Peak Sage”) has long since retired — his body broken, his mind weary, his name only spoken in whispered legends. But when catastrophe strikes his hometown, he is dragged back into the arena.As Liu Zhan returns, he must face rising disciples, ruthless rivals, and a system that devours the weak. With each battle, he seeks not only vengeance but also redemption: reclaiming his former glory, protecting those he cares about, and uncovering just how corrupt the world of martial arts has become.
thursday.japaneseDescription: かつて悪名高き地下格闘技界のトップファイターだった劉占（「頂点の賢者」）は、長い間引退していた。肉体は衰え、精神は疲弊し、その名は囁かれる伝説の中でのみ語られていた。しかし、故郷を襲った災厄により、彼は再び闘技場へと引き戻される。戻ってきた劉占は、次々と現れる弟子たち、冷酷なライバルたち、そして弱者を食い尽くす組織に立ち向かう。戦いを重ねるごとに、彼は復讐だけでなく、贖罪も求めていく。かつての栄光を取り戻し、大切な人々を守り、そして格闘技界がいかに腐敗しているかを暴き出すのだ。

friday.title: Pounding
friday.description: When Soyoon meets someone who seems like a savior, his life begins to change — but being connected to that person also becomes risky, because that person is also his worst enemy. So there’s this struggle between rescue and threat.
friday.japaneseDescription: ソユンは救世主のように思える人物と出会い、人生が変わり始める。しかし、その人物と関わることは同時に危険を伴う。なぜなら、その人物は彼にとって最悪の敵でもあるからだ。救いと脅威の間で葛藤するのだ。

friday.title: Death's Love Ballad
friday.description: In this limbo, Lana starts to explore the mysteries of life and death from her new perspective. She deals with supernatural elements (like reapers / death-figures), magic, and possibly the emotional consequences of knowing the one who ended her life is now involved in her after-life state.
friday.japaneseDescription: この宙ぶらりんの状態の中で、ラナは新たな視点から生と死の謎を探求し始める。彼女は超自然的な要素（死神や死神像など）、魔法、そしておそらくは自分の命を奪った者が今、死後の世界に関わっていることを知ることによる感情的な影響などを扱う。

friday.title: Sand Castle
friday.description: Eunsung, a college student, accidentally walks in on his crush Jiwoo in an empty lecture hall. This incident becomes a secret that brings them closer.At first, Jiwoo treats the relationship in a self-serving way: he uses Eunsung to satisfy his own desires, rather than genuinely caring for him
friday.japaneseDescription: 大学生のウンソンは、誰もいない講義室で、思いを寄せるジウに偶然遭遇する。この出来事がきっかけで、二人はより親密になる。当初、ジウはこの関係を利己的に捉えていた。ウンソンを心から大切に思うのではなく、自分の欲望を満たすために利用していたのだ。

friday.title: Evolution From a Tree
friday.description: The main character is Yu Ziyu. He unexpectedly wakes up not as a human, but reincarnated as a willow tree in a canyon,Around the same time, spirit energy returns to the world, causing many living beings to mutate. This turns the world into a dangerous place full of threats.
friday.japaneseDescription: 主人公の于子豫は、予期せず人間ではなく、峡谷の柳の木に転生した。時を同じくして、精霊の力が再び世界に戻り、多くの生き物が変異し、世界は脅威に満ちた危険な場所へと変貌を遂げる。

saturday.title: Chronicles of the Lazy Sovereign
saturday.description: I couldn’t find solid info on a manga/manhwa titled Chronicles of the Lazy Sovereign. It’s possible it might have a slightly different name, it's very new, or it’s less known so fewer summaries are available.
saturday.japaneseDescription: 「怠惰の君主クロニクルズ」というタイトルのマンガ/マンファについて、確かな情報を見つけることができませんでした。もしかしたら、タイトルが少し違うか、かなり新しい作品なのか、あまり知られていないため、概要が少ないのかもしれません。

saturday.title: Chronicles of the Lazy Sovereign
saturday.description: I couldn’t find solid info on a manga/manhwa titled Chronicles of the Lazy Sovereign. It’s possible it might have a slightly different name, it's very new, or it’s less known so fewer summaries are available.

saturday.title: The Regressed Son of a Duke is an Assassin
saturday.japaneseTitle: 退行した公爵の息子は暗殺者
saturday.description: The protagonist Cyan Vert is famed as the best assassin on the continent. He serves others, works in shadows, trusts people (especially his brother) — until betrayal strikes. He is betrayed by his own brother, someone he considered reliable. This betrayal leads to Cyan’s untimely and unjust death.
saturday.japaneseDescription: 主人公のシアン・ヴェールは、大陸最高の暗殺者として名を馳せている。彼は他者に仕え、影で暗躍し、人々（特に兄）を信頼していたが、裏切りに見舞われる。頼れる存在だと思っていた実の兄に裏切られ、この裏切りが、シアンの不当かつ早すぎる死へと繋がる。

saturday.title: The Regressed Son of a Duke is an Assassin
saturday.japaneseTitle: 退行した公爵の息子は暗殺者

saturday.title: Martial Peak
saturday.description: The story follows Yang Kai, a low-ranked disciple (even a sweeper) at the Sky / Lingxiao Martial Arts Sect. He’s treated poorly by many because he’s considered weak and talentless.One day Yang Kai acquires a mysterious black book (Wordless Black Book) that changes his luck. This sets him on a path of cultivation, trials, battles, rivalries.
saturday.japaneseDescription: 物語は、天空・霊霄武術門の低位弟子（しかも掃除屋）であるヤン・カイを主人公とする。彼は弱く才能がないとみなされ、多くの人々から冷遇されてきた。ある日、ヤン・カイは運命を変える謎の黒書（無言の黒書）を手に入れる。これがきっかけで、彼は修行、試練、戦い、そしてライバルとの闘いの道を歩み始める。

saturday.title: Martial Peak
saturday.description: The story follows Yang Kai, a low-ranked disciple (even a sweeper) at the Sky / Lingxiao Martial Arts Sect. He’s treated poorly by many because he’s considered weak and talentless.One day Yang Kai acquires a mysterious black book (Wordless Black Book) that changes his luck. This sets him on a path of cultivation, trials, battles, rivalries.

saturday.title: I Have Twin Girlfriends
saturday.description: The main character is dating one girl (his girlfriend), but one day she reveals a secret: she has a twin sister — a twin he didn’t know about,This revelation causes confusion, questions of identity (which sister is which?), jealousy, misunderstandings, and a changed dynamic in his relationship(s).The series follows how this secret affects all involved: the protagonist, the girlfriend, and her twin. There are romance and drama, as well as comedic and slice-of-life moments.
saturday.japaneseDescription: 主人公はガールフレンドと付き合っているが、ある日、彼女が秘密を明かす。彼女には双子の妹がいるのだ。彼はその双子のことを知らなかった。この事実は混乱、アイデンティティの疑問（どちらがどちらか？）、嫉妬、誤解、そして二人の関係性の変化を引き起こす。このシリーズは、この秘密が主人公、ガールフレンド、そして双子の妹、関係者全員にどのような影響を与えるのかを描いている。ロマンスやドラマだけでなく、コメディや日常の出来事も盛り込まれている。

saturday.title: Magic Emperor
saturday.description: The magic emperor (Chuo Yifan) was betrayed by the closest people to him because of the legacy of the ancient magical emperor, after his death his soul was transferred to another body and besieged by demons
saturday.japaneseDescription: 魔法皇帝（チュオ・イーファン）は、古代の魔法皇帝の遺産のために、彼に最も近い人々に裏切られ、彼の死後、彼の魂は別の体に移され、悪魔に包囲されました

saturday.title: Magic Emperor
saturday.description: The magic emperor (Chuo Yifan) was betrayed by the closest people to him because of the legacy of the ancient magical emperor, after his death his soul was transferred to another body and besieged by demons
saturday.japaneseDescription: 魔法皇帝（チュオ・イーファン）は、古代の魔法皇帝の遺産のために、彼に最も近い人々に裏切られ、彼の死後、彼の魂は別の体に移され、悪魔に包囲されました

saturday.description: The magic emperor (Chuo Yifan) was betrayed by the closest people to him because of the legacy of the ancient magical emperor, after his death his soul was transferred to another body and besieged by demons

saturday.description: The magic emperor (Chuo Yifan) was betrayed by the closest people to him because of the legacy of the ancient magical emperor, after his death his soul was transferred to another body and besieged by demons

saturday.title: Dragon Ball
saturday.description: Dragon Ball is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Akira Toriyama. It was originally serialized in Weekly Shōnen Jump magazine from 1984 to 1995, and later collected into 42 tankōbon volumes by Shueisha.The story follows Son Goku, a cheerful and naive boy with a monkey tail, as he embarks on a journey to find the seven Dragon Balls — mystical orbs that, when gathered together, can summon a dragon who grants any wish. Along the way, Goku trains in martial arts, makes lifelong friends, and faces powerful foes.
saturday.japaneseDescription: 『ドラゴンボール』は、鳥山明による日本の漫画作品です。1984年から1995年にかけて『週刊少年ジャンプ』で連載され、後に集英社から単行本全42巻として刊行されました。物語は、猿の尻尾を持つ明るく純朴な少年、孫悟空が、7つのドラゴンボールを探す旅に出る様子を描いています。ドラゴンボールとは、集めることでどんな願いも叶えてくれる龍を召喚できる不思議な球体です。旅の途中で、悟空は武術を修行し、生涯の友を作り、強大な敵に立ち向かいます。

saturday.title: Dragon Ball
saturday.description: Dragon Ball is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Akira Toriyama. It was originally serialized in Weekly Shōnen Jump magazine from 1984 to 1995, and later collected into 42 tankōbon volumes by Shueisha.The story follows Son Goku, a cheerful and naive boy with a monkey tail, as he embarks on a journey to find the seven Dragon Balls — mystical orbs that, when gathered together, can summon a dragon who grants any wish. Along the way, Goku trains in martial arts, makes lifelong friends, and faces powerful foes.

saturday.title: Concerto - Mangá Traduzido em PT-BR
saturday.japaneseTitle: 協奏曲 - PT-BR によるマンガ トラドゥジド
saturday.description: Duas amigas que tocam belas melodias juntas ultrapassam os limites da amizade e veem seu relacionamento florescer para algo mais. Contudo, o fim do curso se aproxima, trazendo incertezas: será que o destino vai separá-las? Será que este romance vai alcançar um final feliz, ou a despedida marcará o fim de tudo?
saturday.japaneseDescription: 多くの友人が、メロディアスなジュンタスとウルトラパッサムなOSの制限を制限し、アルゴリズムに合わせてフローレッサーとの関係を確認します。 Contudo, o fim do curso se aproxima, trazendo incertezas: será que o destino vai separá-las?最後のフェリスとのロマンスは、あなたにとって最高のロマンスですか？

newreleasebooks.title: Absolute Regression
newreleasebooks.description: The main character was formerly Gu Feiyang, one of the Ten Martial Emperors. He dies in the Tiandang Mountains.Fifteen years after his death, he is reborn (or reincarnated) as Li Yunxiao in the State of Tianshui. In this new life, he is initially weak / has no opening of his meridians (i.e. considered talentless) by others.With his memories and past power, his goal becomes reclaiming supreme strength and power in a world crowded with geniuses and powerful cultivators.
newreleasebooks.japaneseDescription: 主人公はかつて十武帝の一人、顧飛阳だった。天当山で亡くなり、死後15年後、天水国で李雲霄として生まれ変わる。この新たな人生において、彼は当初は虚弱で、経絡が開通していない（つまり才能がない）と他人から見なされていた。記憶と過去の力を頼りに、天才や強大な修行者で溢れる世界で、最強の力を取り戻すことを目標とする。

newreleasebooks.title: The Cold-Blooded Warrior
newreleasebooks.description: The protagonist is Han Jaewoo, once a hardcore / high-ranked player in the popular game “Savior Of Humanity.” But after a crushing defeat to the Demon Lord, he ends up broke, deep in debt, and disillusioned,But there’s a catch: in order to try for that ending, Han Jaewoo is thrown back into the game world with his stats reset to very low. He starts from almost nothing
newreleasebooks.japaneseDescription: 主人公はハン・ジェウ。かつては人気ゲーム「人類の救世主」のハードコア／高ランクプレイヤーだった。しかし、魔王に惨敗した後、彼は破産し、多額の借金を抱え、幻滅してしまう。しかし、そこには落とし穴があった。そのエンディングを目指すために、ハン・ジェウはステータスを非常に低い状態にリセットされた状態でゲームの世界に戻されるのだ。彼はほぼゼロの状態からスタートする。

newreleasebooks.title: The Regressed Son of a Duke is an Assassin
newreleasebooks.japaneseTitle: 退行した公爵の息子は暗殺者
newreleasebooks.description: The main character is Cyan Vert, who is widely considered the best assassin on the continent.He is betrayed and killed by his own brother, a person he trusted deeply.After dying, Cyan Vert is given a second chance at life (a regression/rebirth). With this new chance, he resolves to live differently: to trust no one else but himself, and to pursue his own goals instead of serving others.The story follows his journey as he reclaims strength, power, and status — navigating betrayal, political intrigue, and the challenges of being powerful but isolated.
newreleasebooks.japaneseDescription: 主人公は、大陸最強の暗殺者と広く称されるシアン・ヴェール。彼は深く信頼していた実の兄に裏切られ、命を落とします。死後、シアン・ヴェールは人生の二度目のチャンス（回帰／再生）を与えられ、この新たなチャンスをきっかけに、彼は人生を一変させることを決意します。それは、自分自身以外誰も信じないこと、そして他者に仕えるのではなく、自らの目的を追求すること。物語は、彼が裏切り、政治的陰謀、そして権力を持ちながらも孤立することの困難を乗り越え、強さ、権力、そして地位を取り戻すまでの道のりを描いています。

newreleasebooks.title: The Regressed Son of a Duke is an Assassin
newreleasebooks.japaneseTitle: 退行した公爵の息子は暗殺者
newreleasebooks.description: Cyan Vert, the best assassin of the continent, meets a pitiful death after having been betrayed by his own brother, whom he had trusted all his life.If I were given another chance at life, I would live it differently. I would only trust myself, and achieve all the things I want on my own without serving anyone else but myself.That is how I was given a second chance at life. The Cyan Vert, a shadow who lived for others, is no more. I will now pave a path on my own, for myself!
newreleasebooks.japaneseDescription: 大陸最強の暗殺者、シアン・ヴェールは、生涯信頼を寄せてきた実の弟に裏切られ、無残な最期を遂げる。もしもう一度人生をやり直せるなら、私は違う生き方をするだろう。自分だけを信じ、誰にも仕えることなく、自分の力で望むものをすべて手に入れる。そうして私は二度目の人生を歩むことができたのだ。他人のために生きてきた影、シアン・ヴェールはもういない。これからは、自分の力で、自分の道を切り拓く！

newreleasebooks.title: The Regressed Son of a Duke is an Assassin
newreleasebooks.japaneseTitle: 退行した公爵の息子は暗殺者

newreleasebooks.title: Player Who Returned 10,000 Years Later
newreleasebooks.japaneseTitle: 1万年後に帰還したプレイヤー
newreleasebooks.description: Player Who Returned 10,000 Years Later ManhwaOne day, out of the blue, he falls into hell. All he has with him is his desire to live and predatory powers. From the thousandth hell to the nine thousandth, he‘s devoured tens and hundreds of thousands of demons, and even the seven archdukes bowed down to him. “Why do you wish to go back? Your Highness already has everything in hell.“ “Everything, my ass.“ There’s nothing to eat or enjoy here! Hell’s nothing but desolate land full of terrible demons! “I will return.“ After ten thousand long years, he finally returns to Earth.
newreleasebooks.japaneseDescription: 一万年後に帰還したプレイヤー マンファある日、突然、地獄に落ちてしまう。 彼に残されたものは、生きる希望と捕食能力だけ。 千番目の地獄から九千番目の地獄まで、何十万もの悪魔を喰らい、七大公ですら彼にひれ伏した。 「なぜ戻るのですか？ 陛下は地獄のすべてをすでに手に入れておられます」「全部だ、くそっ」「ここには食べ物も楽しみもない！ 地獄は恐ろしい悪魔が跋扈する荒涼とした地だ！」 「必ず戻る」 一万年の歳月を経て、ついに彼は地上へと帰還する。

newreleasebooks.title: The Terminally Ill Young Master of the Baek Clan
newreleasebooks.japaneseTitle: 白一族の末期症状の若旦那
newreleasebooks.description: Baek Yigang (also spelled Baek Yi-Gang) is a young master of the Baek Clan, one of the Seven Great Clans of Zhongyuan. He suffers from a serious condition called the Taiyin Qi Blockage, which leaves him unable to accumulate internal energy (ki/qi) and curses him with a severely shortened lifespan.
newreleasebooks.japaneseDescription: 白易剛（ペク・イーガン）は、中原七大氏族の一つ、白氏の若き当主です。彼は「太陰気塞」と呼ばれる重病を患っており、体内のエネルギー（気）を蓄えることが困難で、そのせいで寿命が著しく短くなっています。

newreleasebooks.title: Reincarnation of the Fist King
newreleasebooks.description: The main character is Dan Woosung, a martial artist who relied purely on his fists in the “murim” (a martial-arts / cultivation society). He is killed by a demon faction,After dying, he reincarnates into a new body: that of the eldest son of a wealthy merchant family named Eunha.Although his new life comes with wealth and some comfort, Dan Woosung retains his past life’s strength, skills, and martial know-how. He’s set on repaying debts and settling old grudges rather than seeking comfort.
newreleasebooks.japaneseDescription: 主人公はダン・ウソン。武林（武術・修行集団）で拳のみを頼りに生きてきた武術家。魔族に殺され、死後、裕福な商人の長男であるウナの体に生まれ変わる。富と安楽な生活を手に入れたダン・ウソンだが、前世の強さ、技、そして武術のノウハウはそのままに、安楽を求めるよりも借金の返済と過去の恨みを晴らすことに全力を注いでいる。

newreleasebooks.title: Chronicles of the Lazy Sovereign
newreleasebooks.description: I couldn’t find solid info on a manga/manhwa titled Chronicles of the Lazy Sovereign. It’s possible it might have a slightly different name, it's very new, or it’s less known so fewer summaries are available.
newreleasebooks.japaneseDescription: 「怠惰の君主クロニクルズ」というタイトルのマンガ/マンファについて、確かな情報を見つけることができませんでした。もしかしたら、タイトルが少し違うか、かなり新しい作品なのか、あまり知られていないため、概要が少ないのかもしれません。

newreleasebooks.title: The Regressed Son of a Duke is an Assassin
newreleasebooks.japaneseTitle: 退行した公爵の息子は暗殺者
newreleasebooks.description: The protagonist Cyan Vert is famed as the best assassin on the continent. He serves others, works in shadows, trusts people (especially his brother) — until betrayal strikes. He is betrayed by his own brother, someone he considered reliable. This betrayal leads to Cyan’s untimely and unjust death.
newreleasebooks.japaneseDescription: 主人公のシアン・ヴェールは、大陸最高の暗殺者として名を馳せている。彼は他者に仕え、影で暗躍し、人々（特に兄）を信頼していたが、裏切りに見舞われる。頼れる存在だと思っていた実の兄に裏切られ、この裏切りが、シアンの不当かつ早すぎる死へと繋がる。

newreleasebooks.title: Martial Peak
newreleasebooks.description: The story follows Yang Kai, a low-ranked disciple (even a sweeper) at the Sky / Lingxiao Martial Arts Sect. He’s treated poorly by many because he’s considered weak and talentless.One day Yang Kai acquires a mysterious black book (Wordless Black Book) that changes his luck. This sets him on a path of cultivation, trials, battles, rivalries.
newreleasebooks.japaneseDescription: 物語は、天空・霊霄武術門の低位弟子（しかも掃除屋）であるヤン・カイを主人公とする。彼は弱く才能がないとみなされ、多くの人々から冷遇されてきた。ある日、ヤン・カイは運命を変える謎の黒書（無言の黒書）を手に入れる。これがきっかけで、彼は修行、試練、戦い、そしてライバルとの闘いの道を歩み始める。

newreleasebooks.title: I Have Twin Girlfriends
newreleasebooks.description: The main character is dating one girl (his girlfriend), but one day she reveals a secret: she has a twin sister — a twin he didn’t know about,This revelation causes confusion, questions of identity (which sister is which?), jealousy, misunderstandings, and a changed dynamic in his relationship(s).The series follows how this secret affects all involved: the protagonist, the girlfriend, and her twin. There are romance and drama, as well as comedic and slice-of-life moments.
newreleasebooks.japaneseDescription: 主人公はガールフレンドと付き合っているが、ある日、彼女が秘密を明かす。彼女には双子の妹がいるのだ。彼はその双子のことを知らなかった。この事実は混乱、アイデンティティの疑問（どちらがどちらか？）、嫉妬、誤解、そして二人の関係性の変化を引き起こす。このシリーズは、この秘密が主人公、ガールフレンド、そして双子の妹、関係者全員にどのような影響を与えるのかを描いている。ロマンスやドラマだけでなく、コメディや日常の出来事も盛り込まれている。

newreleasebooks.title: Magic Emperor
newreleasebooks.description: The magic emperor (Chuo Yifan) was betrayed by the closest people to him because of the legacy of the ancient magical emperor, after his death his soul was transferred to another body and besieged by demons
newreleasebooks.japaneseDescription: 魔法皇帝（チュオ・イーファン）は、古代の魔法皇帝の遺産のために、彼に最も近い人々に裏切られ、彼の死後、彼の魂は別の体に移され、悪魔に包囲されました

newreleasebooks.title: Dragon Ball
newreleasebooks.description: Dragon Ball is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Akira Toriyama. It was originally serialized in Weekly Shōnen Jump magazine from 1984 to 1995, and later collected into 42 tankōbon volumes by Shueisha.The story follows Son Goku, a cheerful and naive boy with a monkey tail, as he embarks on a journey to find the seven Dragon Balls — mystical orbs that, when gathered together, can summon a dragon who grants any wish. Along the way, Goku trains in martial arts, makes lifelong friends, and faces powerful foes.
newreleasebooks.japaneseDescription: 『ドラゴンボール』は、鳥山明による日本の漫画作品です。1984年から1995年にかけて『週刊少年ジャンプ』で連載され、後に集英社から単行本全42巻として刊行されました。物語は、猿の尻尾を持つ明るく純朴な少年、孫悟空が、7つのドラゴンボールを探す旅に出る様子を描いています。ドラゴンボールとは、集めることでどんな願いも叶えてくれる龍を召喚できる不思議な球体です。旅の途中で、悟空は武術を修行し、生涯の友を作り、強大な敵に立ち向かいます。

newreleasebooks.title: Concerto - Mangá Traduzido em PT-BR
newreleasebooks.japaneseTitle: 協奏曲 - PT-BR によるマンガ トラドゥジド
newreleasebooks.description: Duas amigas que tocam belas melodias juntas ultrapassam os limites da amizade e veem seu relacionamento florescer para algo mais. Contudo, o fim do curso se aproxima, trazendo incertezas: será que o destino vai separá-las? Será que este romance vai alcançar um final feliz, ou a despedida marcará o fim de tudo?
newreleasebooks.japaneseDescription: 多くの友人が、メロディアスなジュンタスとウルトラパッサムなOSの制限を制限し、アルゴリズムに合わせてフローレッサーとの関係を確認します。 Contudo, o fim do curso se aproxima, trazendo incertezas: será que o destino vai separá-las?最後のフェリスとのロマンスは、あなたにとって最高のロマンスですか？

newreleasebooks.title: 100-Day Romance
newreleasebooks.description: In her final moments after being hit by a car, Yoon Jaeyi regrets never having been in a relationship. Fortunately for her, the god of the afterlife is really into returnee stories and has decided to turn back time for her! Jaeyi now has 100 days in which to find a boyfriend if she wants to keep living. Maybe this will be the nudge she needs to confess to that cute regular at her cafe! Or, when her childhood friend returns from overseas, she might finally get the romance she’s always dreamed of.
newreleasebooks.japaneseDescription: 車に轢かれて最期を迎えるユン・ジェイは、恋愛をしなかったことを後悔していた。しかし、幸運なことに、あの世の神様は帰還者の物語に夢中で、彼女のために時間を戻してくれることに！ジェイは生き続けたいなら、100日以内に彼氏を見つけなければならない。もしかしたら、これがきっかけでカフェの可愛い常連客に告白できるかもしれない！あるいは、幼なじみが海外から帰ってきたら、ずっと夢見ていた恋がついに実現するかもしれない。

newreleasebooks.title: 100-Day Romance
newreleasebooks.description: In her final moments after being hit by a car, Yoon Jaeyi regrets never having been in a relationship. Fortunately for her, the god of the afterlife is really into returnee stories and has decided to turn back time for her! Jaeyi now has 100 days in which to find a boyfriend if she wants to keep living. Maybe this will be the nudge she needs to confess to that cute regular at her cafe! Or, when her childhood friend returns from overseas, she might finally get the romance she’s always dreamed of.
newreleasebooks.japaneseDescription: 車に轢かれて最期を迎えるユン・ジェイは、恋愛をしなかったことを後悔していた。しかし、幸運なことに、あの世の神様は帰還者の物語に夢中で、彼女のために時間を戻してくれることに！ジェイは生き続けたいなら、100日以内に彼氏を見つけなければならない。もしかしたら、これがきっかけでカフェの可愛い常連客に告白できるかもしれない！あるいは、幼なじみが海外から帰ってきたら、ずっと夢見ていた恋がついに実現するかもしれない。
